title: Begone dull care
creator_credit: Norman McLaren, Evelyn Lambart and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A lively interpretation of jazz music played by the Oscar Peterson Trio. The music is visually represented in a series of abstract lines and shapes, hand painted directly on to the film, culminating in a fast and furious explosion as the tempo quickens. One of the high points of jazz in cinema (and of McLaren’s career).
